XII.i.4.C.2.f
.
Urgent PTIVA Requests
Urgent PTIVA requests will be handled using the existing points of contact (POCs) between the PMCs and DFAS and
do not
have to follow the identified schedule.
If the PTIVA request has already been sent to DFAS, then the PMC POC should call the DFAS POC. Re-sending the PTIVA should not be necessary unless requested by DFAS.
